name: SPC Electronic Signature
description: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant electronic signature management

fields.name: v4ascoigf2
fields.label: Signature ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the electronic signature

fields.name: v4atoe8qjl
fields.label: Signer Name
fields.description: User who is signing the document

fields.name: v4a0u2blua
fields.label: Signature Meaning
fields.options:
Authored
Reviewed
Approved
Witnessed
Responsible
Delegate
fields.description: Meaning or purpose of the signature

fields.name: v4asrs8ka3
fields.label: Signature Date
fields.description: Date and time when signature was applied

fields.name: v4a5lkjtit
fields.label: Signature Method
fields.options:
Password
Biometric
Token
Digital Certificate
Multi-Factor

fields.name: v4aeidpo0g
fields.label: User Credentials Verified
fields.description: Confirmation that user credentials were verified

fields.name: v4au703tcn
fields.label: Authorization Level
fields.options:
Level 1 - Basic
Level 2 - Intermediate
Level 3 - Advanced
Level 4 - Critical
fields.description: Level of authorization required for this signature

fields.name: v4abo1dp0m
fields.label: CFR Part 11 Compliant
fields.description: Confirmation of FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliance

fields.name: v4a8vu3ted
fields.label: Signature Components
fields.description: JSON formatted signature components (printed name, date, meaning)

fields.name: v4an9ocln9
fields.label: Signature Valid
fields.description: Current validity status of the signature

fields.name: v4a5dvm92g
fields.label: Verification Method
fields.options:
Digital Certificate
Hash Validation
Timestamp Verification
Biometric Match
Database Verification
fields.description: Method used to verify signature authenticity

fields.name: v4ao2uar0n
fields.label: Witness Signature
fields.description: Reference to witness signature if required

fields.name: v4ala3206b
fields.label: Certificate Serial Number
fields.description: Serial number of digital certificate used

fields.name: v4acj5fv25
fields.label: Signature Expiration
fields.description: Expiration date of the signature validity
